Look but Don't Touch.name: Look but Don't Touch
Look but Don't Touch.description:
Frequency once per day

Many flowers are beautiful to look upon but deadly to touch—and you're one of them. For 1 minute, any creature that touches you or damages you with a melee weapon without the reach trait or with a melee unarmed attack takes @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage.

Mask of Fear.name: Mask of Fear
Mask of Fear.description:
Trigger You start your turn with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition.

Requirements You're wearing your warmask.

Your warmask burns off of your face, releasing your apprehension. You remove the frightened condition. Your warmask is destroyed, and you can't reapply it until your next daily preparations.

Special You can use this free action even if you have a condition tied to the frightened condition that would normally prevent you from using a free action, such as "@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} as long as you're frightened" or "@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} as long as you're frightened."

Font of Life or Death.name: 生死洗礼 Font of Life or Death
Font of Life or Death.description: 随着你在登神长阶中更进一步，你能够更加自如地调动生与死的能量。选择治疗术或伤害术；你获得选择的法术作为8环内在法术，每日可以施放三次。你的使徒也可以花费你的每日次数来施放所选法术。

Once and Future.name: 荣光长存 Once and Future
Once and Future.description: 尽管卑鄙的背叛可能将你击倒，或者黑暗魔法可能让你灰心，但当人们迫切需要你时，你依然会挺身而出护佑万民。只要你的骑士之一还活着，并且在30英尺内，你便不会因年老之外的因素而死亡；如果你的濒死或毁灭状态将要增加到足以杀死你的值，其便不会增加，任何会立即杀死你的效果都只会让你减少到0点生命值。每年你第一次因年老以外的任何原因死亡时，你会以两倍于你等级的生命值复活并获得1神话点。如果你真正死亡并且没有在一年内复活，你就会重生为一个孩子，来到世界上传颂你辉煌成就的某处，进入新的凡俗身体之中。除非世人悉数将你遗忘，否则你不会结束在灵魂之流的轮回之旅。

Schooled in Secrets.name: 知晓秘印 Schooled in Secrets
Schooled in Secrets.description:
你能注意到神秘教团等秘密社群的成员用来向同僚表明身份的标志和徽记。在对这类群体[[/act gather-information skill=occultism]]{收集信息}，或者[[/act impersonate skill=occultism]]{乔装}成这类群体的成员时，你可以用神秘技能替代交涉和欺骗技能。

若你隶属于一个秘密教团、结社、教派，或类似的组织，你会自动认出你的同僚，除非他们特意尝试对你隐瞒自己的存在。他们也可以自动认出你的身份，除非你特意隐瞒。

Slip with the Breeze.description: You create gusts of wind when you jump, allowing you to carry yourself across greater distances. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.ZBhvJ9O8MvBFAlhq]{Quick Jump} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.HJYQlmGTdtyGWr6a]{Powerful Leap} skill feats as bonus feats.
Slip with the Breeze.name: Slip with the Breeze

Ravel of Thorns.name: 缠结荆棘 Ravel of Thorns
Ravel of Thorns.description:
你御能灵光中的表面都会长出几何图案一般的带刺荆棘。在荆棘中开始回合的生物，其速度受到-10环境减值，直到其离开灵光。荆棘是有害地形。每当生物以移动进入这些方格时，都会受到@Damage[(floor((@actor.level -4)/4)+2)[piercing]]伤害。如果荆棘有任意方格位于水面或土壤上，则所有荆棘的有害地形伤害翻倍。如果你移动，荆棘会消失，然后在你回合结束时重新长出。

等级（+4） 伤害增加1点。

Rebirth in Living Stone.name: 转生活石 Rebirth in Living Stone
Rebirth in Living Stone.description:
岩石自内蔓延而出遮复你的形体，随后开裂展现出已经化为活石的身躯。你获得40点临时生命值。你免疫重击和精准伤害。当你站在岩石或泥土表面上时，你无法被推离、拉拽或摔绊。你的土元素冲击造成额外1d10伤害，使用通常的伤害类型。这些好处持续到你的下个回合结束，但是你能维持最多1分钟。当你从该涌动获得临时生命值后，你在10分钟内无法再从本涌动获得临时生命值。

等级（20级） 你获得50临时生命值。

Eye for Treasure.name: Eye for Treasure
Eye for Treasure.description:
You know good artisanship when you see it and can wax poetic about crafting techniques and forms.

You become trained in Crafting and gain a +1 circumstance bonus on all Crafting checks made to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}. If you would automatically become trained in Crafting (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

In addition, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.voYr7ygVcWmlg1f4]{Crafter's Appraisal} skill feat, enabling you to identify magic items using the Crafting skill.

Liberty or Death.name: 冥顽不灵者死 Liberty or Death
Liberty or Death.description:
需求 一个生物被你指定为解放通牒的目标，且至少持续了1分钟。

你已经给了那暴君足够的时间来考虑，现在，他要么交出权力，要么死。花费一个神话点来对满足需求的目标进行一次应用神话熟练度的打击。如果命中并成功造成伤害，目标必须成功通过一次@Check[fortitude|against:class-spell]豁免来对抗你的职业DC与法术DC中的较高者，否则立即死亡。若豁免成功，则其在24小时内临时免疫此能力。

Slip the Grasp.name: Slip the Grasp
Slip the Grasp.description:
Requirements You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}.

You have some feature that allows you to quickly evade effects that restrain you. Attempt a check to Escape. If you succeed, you can Stride, Step, or make a Strike with a melee unarmed attack targeting the creature you Escaped from. If you fail, you instead attempt to Escape a second time.

You increase your multiple attack penalty as appropriate for the actions you took, but only after completing both actions.

Reprisal of the Fallen.name: 死难者的复仇 Reprisal of the Fallen
Reprisal of the Fallen.description: 那些死于暴君之手的罹难者的悲伤，痛苦与怒火穿越死亡的帷纱，令你感同身受，并能唤起这些情感的力量，为他们报仇雪恨。每小时一次，你可以施放9环@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.hghGRzOSzEl4UXdS]或@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.FEsuyf203wTNE2et]作为内在异能法术。决定法术效果时，使用你的职业DC或法术DC，二者取高。

Keep up Appearances.name: Keep up Appearances
Keep up Appearances.description:
Access Taldan nationality

Trigger You are affected by an emotion effect.

Taldan pride means you never show weakness. Roll a @Check[deception] check and compare the result to any observing creatures' Perception DCs. On a success, that creature believes you were unaffected by the emotion effect.

A creature tricked in this manner can't benefit from the emotion effect and can't use abilities that require you to be under this emotion effect; for example, if you successfully use this ability to trick a will-o'-wisp into believing you aren't under a fear effect, it can't use its Feed on Fear ability on you.

Speak with Flowers.name: Speak with Flowers
Speak with Flowers.description: At your very heartwood, you're a flower animated by elder magic, and with a little effort, you can speak to your kindred. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the Diplomacy skill with flowering plants of all types.

prerequisites.value: trained in Medicine or Tian Xia Lore

Meditate on This!.name: Meditate on This!
Meditate on This!.description:
Access Tian Xia origin

You meditate to alter your qi, coloring it with your resentment and anger. Until the start of your next turn, whenever you hit a creature with an unarmed Strike, or an adjacent creature deals piercing, slashing, or bleed damage to you, the creature that you hit or that damaged you must attempt a @Check[will|against:barbarian] save against your class DC. The creature is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} until the end of its next turn.

Mask of Power.name: Mask of Power
Mask of Power.description:
Your warmask sharpens your connection to the source of your mask's power. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}.

Until your next daily preparations, you can cast this spell as a 1st-rank innate spell once per day; the spell's tradition is determined by the tradition tied to your warmask. You must be wearing your warmask to Cast the Spell.

Stymie the Gods.description:
频率 每小时一次

作为行走于凡世的新生神明，你调动自己的意志便能隔绝那些遥居天外的实体所施加的影响，哪怕祂们比你更古老，更强大也无妨。你和你的使徒均可以使用此动作。当你们之一如此做时，你们二者均会在对抗神术法术，以及对抗跨位面生物的法术，打击和能力的AC与豁免骰上获得+2状态加值，持续3轮。此增益即使在你们二者被隔绝在不同位面的情况下，也会在其中一者使用后对你们同时生效。

如果你们之一在使用绝地天通时花费神话点，则该效果的加值提升至+4，且持续10分钟。
Stymie the Gods.name: 绝地天通 Stymie the Gods

History of Violence.name: History of Violence
History of Violence.description: Your attacks bring with them echoes of previous battles, calling the unquiet victims of your most brutal acts to savage your opponents. Make a Strike. If this Strike hits, you deal additional void damage equal to your key attribute modifier to the target and all enemies within 30 feet. If your attack is a critical hit, you deal twice as much damage instead, and the target of your Strike takes persistent void damage equal to your key attribute modifier as your fallen foes attempt to drag the target into oblivion with them. This Strike counts as two attacks for calculating your multiple attack penalty.

Read the Roots.name: 解读根系 Read the Roots
Read the Roots.description:
需求 你站在地面上，你周围100尺内有植物扎根

树木的根系是一道触及深远的信息网，而你知晓如何接触它们并获取它们的秘密。你使用震颤感知在30尺内@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]，这是一种模糊感官，取代你自身的一种感官。你也可以用此法侦测接触你站立表面或在你站立表面中掘进的对象。

Rattle the Earth.name: 震撼大地 Rattle the Earth
Rattle the Earth.description:
激发地心深处岩石的重力，你制造了一场地震。这具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu]效果，但是来源于你，并且区域为60尺锥形或你御能灵光的范围。你和你的空间不受地震影响。地震制造的裂隙只有10尺深；对于崩塌的纯骰检定，其DC+4。

等级（16级） 裂隙只有20尺深，纯骰检定的DC+2

等级（20级） 裂隙和纯骰检定与法术效果相同

Flourish and Ruin.name: 枯荣 Flourish and Ruin
Flourish and Ruin.description: 你能够唤起你精魂内的活力要素来治愈你的盟友，你也同样能抽出藤条来捆缚并猛击你的敌人。你能以6环级原能内在法术的形式施放@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x5rGOmhDRDVQPrnW]和@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JbAcSLu62TU1OgNF]，两种法术每日各一次。

Ignite the Sun.name: 点燃烈日 Ignite the Sun
Ignite the Sun.description:
创生之火为你控制。你在500尺射程内创造一个@Template[burst|distance:5]的微型太阳。任何时候在微型太阳中的生物受到@Damage[7d6[fire]|options:area-damage]伤害，尝试@Check[reflex|against:kineticist|basic|options:area-effect]豁免对抗你的职业DC。一个生物每轮只会承受一次该伤害。太阳在@Template[emanation|distance:500]范围投下明亮光（在之后的500尺范围投下昏暗光）；这对于那些拥有阳光易伤的生物来说视为阳光。

阳光会持续到你的下个回合结束，但你可以维持它长达1分钟。当你每轮第一次维持该涌动时，你可以选择将太阳的爆发范围增加5尺，然后让它飞行最多30尺。太阳能穿过生物，同时对穿过的生物造成上述伤害。

太阳会持续将火焰能量引导至你和你的盟友身上。你和每个位于太阳光照范围内的盟友，其所有的打击、造成火焰伤害的法术、以及造成火焰伤害的涌动（除了点燃烈日本身）都会造成额外@Damage[1d6[fire]]伤害。存在多个太阳不会叠加此额外伤害。

Wings of the Dragon.description: You can manifest draconic wings to soar through the air at great speed. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.HWJODX2zPg5cg34F]{Dragon Wings} sorcerer bloodline spell and a focus pool of 1 Focus Point. If you already have a focus pool, increase your number of Focus Points by 1.
Wings of the Dragon.name: Wings of the Dragon

Favor of Heaven.description: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side. Once per day, you can cast a 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.PHVHBbdHeQRfjLmE]{Spirit Blast} as a divine innate spell. In addition, you gain resistance 5 to both holy and unholy.
Favor of Heaven.name: Favor of Heaven

Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.name: 自由之心交响曲 Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
Symphony of the Unfettered Heart.description: 你学到了@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZAX0OOcKtYMQlquR]组曲法术，使你能够保护一名盟友免受失能状态。

Hurl at the Horizon.description:
Usage imbued into a thrown or melee weapon ikon

Your weapon flies from your hand as if propelled under its own power. The imbued ikon gains the following ability.

Immanence Your weapon gains the thrown 15 feet trait, or increases its thrown distance by 10 feet if it already has the thrown trait.
Hurl at the Horizon.name: Hurl at the Horizon

Mask of Rejection.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger You fail a saving throw against an effect from your warmask's magical tradition.

Requirements You're wearing your warmask.

Your warmask projects a white-hot fury that attempts to vaporize the offending magic. You reroll the triggering check with a +2 circumstance bonus, but you must use the new result, even if it's worse than your first roll.
Mask of Rejection.name: Mask of Rejection

Pack of the Beast Lord.name: 号令兽群 Pack of the Beast Lord
Pack of the Beast Lord.description: 你和你的统合伙伴召集它同类的助力，聚拢起一支由你伙伴的复制虚影组成的可怕兽群大军。花费一个神话点。你的统合伙伴变为巨型，持续1分钟。其获得对精准伤害的免疫、对物理伤害的抗力，等同于你等级的一半、以及对范围伤害的弱点，等同于你等级的一半。在此形态下，你的统合伙伴获得@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ZJ8KJp5mZYgzPJYN]动作，在你执行此行动时，作为行动的一部分你可以立即指挥它来使用该动作。

Everyone's a Suspect.description:
你对遇到的每个人都保持怀疑，在脑内记录击败他们的思路，即使是你的盟友也不例外。

与生物进行了至少1分钟的互动后，你会将该生物当作客体并自动进行@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xTK2zsWFyxSJvYbX]能力。无论何时你都可以维持无数这类方向，而当你再次使用追查方向时，你不需放弃这些自动方向。
Everyone's a Suspect.name: 无人可信 Everyone's a Suspect

Rites of Transfiguration.name: 易躯之仪 Rites of Transfiguration
Rites of Transfiguration.description: 你掌握了以庇护主之大能，将其他生物的躯体转变为更符合其行事方法或你的心情的外貌。你的魔宠学会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]，即便恶意变形术可能不在你的根源法术表上。你可透过与魔宠交流10分钟，来将一个已用6级以上的女巫法术位准备的其他法术替换成恶意变形术，升阶到相同的环级。

Ebb and Flow.name: 能量涨落 Ebb and Flow
Ebb and Flow.description: 你同时唤来命能和虚能，伤害你的敌人并治愈你的盟友。如果你的下个动作是施放1动作或者2动作版本的@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.rfZpqmj0AIIdkVIs]或者@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]，选择区域中一个会被该法术所伤害的生物，并且选择区域中另一个会被该法术治愈的生物。你的治疗术或者伤害术同时以这些生物为目标。

Might of the Realm.name: 国度至权 Might of the Realm
Might of the Realm.description: 在你骑士的在场支持下，你以宰治之名挥出至高一击。打击一名敌人。在计算多重攻击减值时，这视为两次攻击。如果该次打击命中，你会造成等同你能看见的骑士数量两倍的额外伤害。如果该次打击重击，目标还会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}直到你下个回合开始。

Song of Marching.description: 你学会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.LTUaK3smfm5eDiFK]组曲戏法，让你和你的盟友能行军长远的距离而不致疲惫。
Song of Marching.name: 行军乐 Song of Marching

Pierce the Eye.description:
需求 你正持用一件远程武器

你瞄准射向一名敌人眼睛来令其失明。进行一次远程打击。在命中时，目标额外受到@Damage[2d8[persistent,bleed]]伤害。目标还必须尝试一次@Check[fortitude|against:class]豁免对抗你的职业DC，这具有如下效果：

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]直到其下个回合结束。

失败 目标在持续流血期间目盲，并在结束后还会目盲一轮。

大失败 类似失败，但目标在移除持续流血伤害的纯骰检定上受到-2环境减值。使用急救来停止持续流血伤害的生物也会在医疗检定上受到-2环境减值。
Pierce the Eye.name: 射目 Pierce the Eye

Glory and Valor!.description:
Frequency once per day

You call upon your ascendant blood with a mighty cry that fills you with a revitalizing energy for 1 minute or until you critically fail a Strike, whichever comes first. For the duration, the first time each round you successfully Strike a creature of your level or higher, you regain @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))[healing]]{Hit Points equal to half your level}.
Glory and Valor!.name: Glory and Valor!

Glutton for Flesh.description: 你能够在枯槁的肉体中储存更多的肉，使自己能够在更久的时间里满足对血肉的渴求。若你在满足状态下使用@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1If9lLVoZdO8woVg]，则会变为饱腹状态。你的饱腹状态会持续3小时，之后会在满足状态下持续1小时。若你在饱腹状态中使用那些会终止满足状态的能力，则会改为终止饱腹状态并进入满足状态。若你具有@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7GrACprIxZuarGDs]专长，那么当你处于饱腹状态时，速度会获得+10尺状态加值，以取代原本的满足状态下获得+5尺状态加值。
Glutton for Flesh.name: 贪食血肉 Glutton for Flesh

No Cause for Alarm.description:
你尝试平定他人的惊恐情绪。尝试一次@Check[diplomacy]检定，与@Template[emanation|distance:10]范围内处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]状态的生物的意志DC相比较。这些生物都会在1小时内暂时免疫此效果。

大成功 生物的惊惧值降低2。

成功 生物的惊惧值降低1。
No Cause for Alarm.name: 无需惊慌 No Cause for Alarm

Lord of the Fiends.description: 你将每一个魔物都视为未来的研究对象，并能一眼评估他们。消耗1神话点。尝试以神话熟练度对你能看到的每个魔族进行知识回忆检定。在接下来的一小时内，每当你对魔物进行欺骗、交涉和威吓检定成功时，你都会改为获得大成功。
Lord of the Fiends.name: 魔族之主 Lord of the Fiends

Ode to Ouroboros.description: 你学会@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DgCS456mXKw97vNy]组曲法术，它能让你的盟友暂时免于一死。
Ode to Ouroboros.name: 衔尾蛇颂 Ode to Ouroboros

Scour the Library.description: 看到敌人的攻击时，你迅速在脑海中查阅无数学识的碎片，将其合成为一个完美的计划。对60尺内的一个生物进行回忆知识检定（使用适当的技能）。如果果成功，除了一般的好处外，你在下一次对该生物的攻击骰和你对抗该生物下次攻击的AC上获得+1的环境加值。在大成功时，加值是+2。
Scour the Library.name: 疾览群卷 Scour the Library

Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent).description:
Pathfinders are trained to help each other be safe and successful, and you know how to jolt your allies back to their senses. Attempt a Medicine check on an adjacent ally who is fascinated, frightened, stunned, or stupefied and choose one of those conditions. The DC is the DC for the effect that caused the condition.

Critical Success Reduce the value of the chosen condition by 2. If you chose fascinated, that condition ends.

Success Reduce the value of the chosen condition by 1. If you chose fascinated, that condition ends.

Failure The target is unaffected.

Critical Failure You increase the value of the chosen condition by 1. If you chose fascinated, increase the duration by 1 round instead.
Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent).name: Snap Out of It! (Pathfinder Agent)

One Among the Masses.description: It will take more than a gathered mass of foes to take you down. You gain resistance equal to your level to damage dealt by swarms, troops, and creatures who occupy the same space as you. In addition, you can briefly menace large groups of enemies to step aside. You gain the@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.QGeA2sPtDdryTpWw]{ Overawe Crowd} activity.
One Among the Masses.name: One Among the Masses

You Can’t Kill an Idea.description:
当你牺牲之时，你化为了一种强大而无形的实体。如果你在解放通牒启动时死亡，你（以及你的装备）将转变为理念形态。

在理念形态下，你处于@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]和虚体状态。你的HP恒定为1且无法恢复，并对所有伤害免疫；如果你的濒死或毁灭状态值将要增加至死亡阈值，则其不会增加，且你免疫任何可能立即杀死或摧毁你的效果。你免疫@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]状态，但仅能进行纯粹的精神活动。你可以使用心灵感应与无限距离的盟友进行交流，并且在每个回合获得两个额外的反应，你只能通过心灵感应的方式来协助盟友，且无需预先花费一个动作来准备协助，你可以花费一个神话点来以神话熟练度进行协助。你通过协助赋予的任意环境价值增加1。

在理念形态持续1小时后，你必须选择一名自愿追随你理念的同志，与其融为一体并脱离理念形态。融合后的新生形态使用你的等级和对方的族裔，传承以及族裔专长。剩余的职业，属性调整值，技能与专长如何结合由你与GM共同商议决定。这名新角色继承了你先前的所有装备。如果你未能在进入理念形态1小时之内融合，你脱离理念形态并死亡；而你原先死亡时携带的所有装备都会消失。
You Can’t Kill an Idea.name: 理念不死 You Can’t Kill an Idea

Sense for Trouble.description:
You can tell when something's off. You can trigger @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.7qBuzHY8kEG8SdEP]{Cat's Luck} after you roll initiative, in addition to its normal trigger, to reroll your Initiative and take the higher of the two results.

This still counts against Cat's Luck's frequency, as normal.
Sense for Trouble.name: Sense for Trouble
